title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2021-34360 QNAP NAS Vulnerability

titles: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2021-34360 QNAP NAS Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2021-34360 QNAP NAS Vulnerability

sentences: QNAP NAS is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Proxy Server. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to perform unauthorized actions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.
QNAP QTS 4.5.x Proxy Server 1.4.2<crlf>QNAP QTS 5.0.x Proxy Server 1.4.2<crlf>QNAP QuTS hero h5.0.x Proxy Server 1.4.3<crlf>QNAP QuTScloud c4.5.x Proxy Server 1.4.2

QNAP NAS is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Proxy Server. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to perform unauthorized actions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.

An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.
